roleset.name: not usual, average or widespread
roleset.note: UNCOMMON-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, common-j.01. (from uncommon.01-j)

role.descr: entity observing, perceiving arg1 as uncommon

example.name: arg1
example.text: Given the way these stories get exaggerated , " several improvised explosive devices " could mean anything down to a few bundles of firecrackers -- or nothing at all , since false reports are n't at all uncommon .
